name: Duck In a Library
description:
My Entry for My First Game Jam Winter 2021!

A very short prototype of a potentially expanded upon game, You play as a duck in a library! There's things to read and things to nap on! This project is more so a test in using RPG maker MV, thus the gameplay is lacking. 

Despite this, I hope you enjoy this as much as I enjoyed making it. I hope to potentially revisit the project later and expand upon the Duck In a Library lore, but I can't make any promises.
